name: Driv3r
description:
In 1999 it was Driver, in 2000 it was Driver 2. Having won game of the year awards all across Europe and the US, and collecting an interactive BAFTA, now the groundbreaking 3d action driving game is back.

  • Over 70 playable vehicles, including cars, bikes, boats, artics, and buses.
  • 8 different weapons, including handguns, machine guns and grenade launchers.
  • Over 30 story integrated missions.
